tool_description: an API that returns current PDGA United States Tour Rankings. Data includes player name, rating, picture, and PDGA profile . Includes male and female disc golf players.
name: Current PDGA United States Tour Rankings
title: Current PDGA United States Tour Rankings
tool_name: Current PDGA United States Tour Rankings

api_list.name: Get Women's Rankings
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back data from the PDGA United States Tour including player name, rank, rating, picture & PDGA profile url.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://current-pdga-united-states-tour-rankings.p.rapidapi.com/pdga-rankings-women"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "current-pdga-united-states-tour-rankings.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
